headline: Why The Narrative Around IFF Is Shifting After Recent Analyst and Business Developments
summary: International Flavors & Fragrances has seen its Fair Value Estimate revised downward from $83.49 to $81.96, reflecting analysts’ slightly more cautious stance. This change comes amid uncertain short-term growth expectations and evolving views on the company's recovery trajectory. Stay tuned to discover how you can track ongoing updates to the stock’s valuation narrative as the landscape continues to shift. headline: Assessing International Flavors & Fragrances (IFF) Valuation Following BofA's Outlook Upgrade and Renewed Investor Interest
summary: International Flavors & Fragrances (NYSE:IFF) shares caught market attention this week after BofA Securities upgraded their outlook for the company. The firm highlighted a more upbeat view on future prospects. See our latest analysis for International Flavors & Fragrances. After a tough few quarters, International Flavors & Fragrances shares have started to show some momentum. The stock climbed 7% over the past week, outpacing broader peers, as investors reacted to expansion news and an...

headline: IFF Doubles Down in India: Will Mumbai Expansion Strengthen Its Long-Term Growth Strategy?
summary: Earlier this month, International Flavors & Fragrances announced plans to open a new scent creative center in Mumbai’s Powai district, aiming for full operational status by mid-2026. This expansion more than doubles the company’s local footprint in India and enables closer collaboration with customers via advanced labs and sensory spaces. We’ll explore how this investment in the fast-growing Indian fragrance market could impact IFF’s long-term positioning and growth outlook. These 10...
